name of various places including Gold Coast (Australian city), Gold Coast (former British colony in Africa) and Costa Daurada (area on the coast of Catalonia, Spain)

sentences.english: Bank of the Volga river before the plant construction in 1950.
Luxor, a city on the banks of the Nile, was our next stop.
sentences.chinese: 位于尼罗河岸的卢克孛城是我们的下一站。

sentences.english: The steamer was beating along the coast.
Their ship touched land a month later.
sentences.chinese: 一个月以后他们的船靠了岸。

sentences.english: They built a dam along the seashore to retain the seawater.
sentences.chinese: 他们沿海岸筑起一道堤坝以拦住海水。

sentences.english: They beached the ship to save it.
sentences.chinese: 他们把船拖上了岸以便救它。

sentences.english: Oxford Landing was established in 1958 on the bands of the majestic murray river in south Australia.
sentences.chinese: 牛津园于1958年在南澳宏伟的墨累河岸推出。

sentences.english: As I wended the shores I know.
Piebald spot Department of Chueiyang only shore, where the southwest wind to be good.
sentences.chinese: 斑骓只系垂杨岸，何处西南待好风。

sentences.english: When will I see the shore?
They hit the enemy warships prowling along the coast.
sentences.chinese: 他们击中沿海岸偷航的敌舰。

sentences.english: As I wend to the shores I know not.
A city of northern Chile on the Pacific Ocean near the Peruvian border.
sentences.chinese: 阿里卡智利北部一城市，位于太平洋岸秘鲁边界附近。

sentences.english: As ice shelves break up , this accelerates movement of land ice to the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 冰棚一旦断裂，会让岸冰加速往海洋移动。

sentences.english: For the moment, the floods have allowed the Darling’s farmers to fill their reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，洪水让达令河岸的农民们又注满了水库。

sentences.english: When will I see the shore …
sentences.chinese: 究竟什么时候才能看到岸的彼方？
